live_updates: Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve it. Thank you for your patience.
Technicians are on site working to restore service as quickly as possible. No ETA at this time but we will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available.
Tech crews continue to work in the area to restore services.
Teams remain on site working to resolve the issues in the area.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
50464.summary: Some customers in the Carter Crest area of Edmonton are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
50464.title: June 11 - Edmonton (Carter Crest) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
